name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience developing high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in core programming languages including **Java**, **JavaScript**, **Python**, and adept in frontend and backend frameworks such as **React**, **Vue.js**, and **Node.js**. Proven expertise in **SQL**, **REST**, and various development methodologies, ensuring efficient and compliant solutions in alignment with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.

Hands-on skills include building AI/ML-powered platforms with predictive analytics, real-time processing, and experience in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Strong background in microservices and CI/CD implementation, ensuring alignment with best practices in software development. Well-versed in MLOps with tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, combining technical proficiency with effective teamwork, problem-solving, and project management abilities.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **JavaScript**, **Python** (including frameworks like Flask and Django), and **Java** to develop robust, full-stack applications, ensuring a seamless integration with databases using **SQL** and **JPA**.
Developed responsive web applications with **HTML**, **CSS**, and modern front-end libraries such as **React** (17–18) and **Vue.js**, providing user-friendly interfaces while adhering to software development methodologies.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance project delivery through effective **team collaboration** and **problem-solving** skills, achieving project milestones within **90%** of deadlines.
Executed code reviews and established **quality assurance** practices, diminishing bug rates by over **30%** through strategic unit and integration testing, utilizing tools like **JUnit** and **Cypress**.
Implemented documentation processes to maintain clarity in project scope and deliverables, ensuring all technical specifications and APIs were accurately recorded and communicated.
Led initiatives to improve project management methodologies, increasing team productivity by **20%** while focusing on **empathy** in team dynamics and stakeholder communications.
Integrated third-party tools and services using **AJAX**, **JSON**, and **REST** to enhance application functionalities and improve user experiences.
Streamlined development processes by adopting **Agile** methodologies, resulting in enhanced project adaptability and continuous deployment improvements with tools like **Git** and **SVN**.
Conducted thorough testing and optimization of web applications across various browsers and platforms, ensuring compatibility and performance within **98%** of user environments.

- Utilized **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **SQL** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
- Developed interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver **sleek**, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
- Created real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, leading to a **30%** reduction in response time to incidents.
- Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows, such as payments and compliance, which improved throughput by **25%**.
- Developed **ETL pipelines** for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating both batch and real-time processing for over **1 million** records daily.
- Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and patterns, with an accuracy improvement of **15%**.
- Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, significantly enhancing decision-making processes.

- Developed scalable backend services utilizing **Python** (Django, FastAPI) and **JavaScript** (Node.js, Express, NestJS) for a high-traffic global e-commerce platform, ensuring consistent uptime of **99.9%**.
- Implemented **JavaScript** frameworks (**React 18**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**) to deliver fast and responsive frontend applications, optimizing user experience across mobile and web with a focus on performance enhancements of at least **30%**.
- Engineered real-time capabilities leveraging **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, providing real-time updates for over **10,000** concurrent users.
- Streamlined data access using **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra**, achieving data retrieval speeds of under **50ms** for high-traffic workflows.
- Integrated advanced AI/ML recommendation systems employing **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, enhancing product search relevance and improving conversion rates by **15%**.
- Utilized **Redis** caching effectively for product metadata and search results, significantly boosting application responsiveness and ensuring a reduction in database read pressure by **25%**.
- Adopted **LaunchDarkly** for feature flags and orchestrated blue-green deployments with **Kubernetes**, facilitating safer rollouts and risk management for major updates, reducing deployment time by **40%**.
- Designed mobile-first, SEO-friendly e-commerce user interfaces using **Next.js** and **HTML5/CSS3**, achieving compliance with **WCAG 2.1** accessibility guidelines.
- Developed secure payment integrations with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, maintaining PCI compliance and processing secure transactions efficiently.
- Enforced role-based access control (RBAC) and employed **OAuth 2.0** to ensure secure access for both customers and administrators, safeguarding user data in compliance with **GDPR**.
